title.narrative: Zambia Political Participation and Leadership Activity

description.narrative: (Zambia): The Political Participation and Leadership (PPL) mechanism implemented by the Consortium For Elections & Political Process Strengthening and National Democratic Institute (CEPPS/NDI) promotes an inclusive, competitive, and representative political system that can enhance the long-term prosperity and stability of Zambia. With FY 2020 funds, NDI will provide targeted support towards the 2021 general elections, such as domestic observation electoral monitoring and expanding civil society engagement with GRZ stakeholders on electoral and political reforms. ZPPL activities include: support to civil society engagement in policy reform, and promotion of informed civic participation; and support to national civil society to effectively respond to unanticipated threats or opportunities for Zambia's democratic process. These interventions will enhance Zambia's political process and advance the nation's development. Under USAID/Zambia's Country Development Cooperation Strategy, the mechanism will support Development Objective 1: Citizen and National Self- Reliance Advanced by More Effective, Accountable Governance...
